home.subtitle: A welcoming community of believers committed to serving God and our neighbors. Join us as we grow in faith, love, and service together.

services.title: Sunday Morning Hokkien Service
services.description: Traditional worship with hymns and contemporary elements

home.aboutDesc: Learn about our mission, history, and leadership team
home.ministriesDesc: Find a place to serve and connect with others
home.resourcesDesc: Daily devotions, Bible studies, and more

about.title: About Bethany Presbyterian Church
about.missionText: To glorify God by making disciples of all nations through the proclamation of the Gospel, the teaching of God's Word, and the building of a loving community that serves one another and reaches out to the world.
about.visionText: To be a vibrant, Christ-centered community where every member is growing in faith, connected in fellowship, and engaged in ministry, impacting Singapore and beyond with the love and truth of Jesus Christ.
about.historyText: Bethany Presbyterian Church was established in [YEAR] with a vision to serve the community and spread the Gospel in Singapore. What began as a small gathering of faithful believers has grown into a vibrant congregation committed to God's work.

visit.title: Visit Us
visit.planVisitText: We'd love to welcome you! If you're planning to visit for the first time, here's what to expect:

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect
whatToExpect.intro: We're so glad you're considering visiting Bethany Presbyterian Church! Whether you're new to church or looking for a new church home, we want you to feel welcome and comfortable.
whatToExpect.readyText: We'd love to see you this Sunday! If you have any questions before your visit, please don't hesitate to reach out.

beliefs.title: What We Believe
beliefs.intro: Our beliefs are grounded in the Bible, which we believe to be the inspired, inerrant Word of God. As a Presbyterian church, we hold to the historic Christian faith as expressed in the Reformed tradition.

services.title: Services
services.description: Watch our past Sunday service live streams. All messages are grounded in Scripture and designed to help you grow in your relationship with God.
services.noServicesDesc: Services will appear here once they are added to the content folder.

events.title: Events
events.description: Join us for worship, fellowship, and community events. Check out our upcoming activities!
events.noEvents: No events scheduled at this time.
events.noEventsDesc: Events will appear here once they are added to the content folder.

ministries.title: Ministries
ministries.description: At Bethany Presbyterian Church, we believe that every member has a role to play in the body of Christ. Explore our ministries and find a place to serve, grow, and connect with others.
ministries.interestedText: We'd love to help you find a place to serve and use your gifts for God's kingdom. Whether you're interested in one of these ministries or have other ideas, we're here to help you get connected.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Grow in your faith with our collection of devotions, Bible studies, and helpful resources.
resources.noResourcesDesc: Resources will appear here once they are added to the content folder.

give.title: Give
give.intro: Thank you for your heart to support the ministry of Bethany Presbyterian Church. Your generous giving enables us to serve our community, support missions, and share the love of Christ.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.officeHoursText:
Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

footer.churchDesc: A welcoming community of believers committed to serving God and our neighbors.
